metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29910 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
When closed or sent to the background, Firefox for Android would not properly record and persist HSTS settings.
*Note: This issue only affected Firefox for Android. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 100.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap seth-arnold> This issue affects Firefox for Android

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
